public class myRepository
    {
    public myClasses.Type[] GetAllTypes()
    {
        return new myClasses.Type[]
        {
            new myClasses.Type 
            {
                typeId=""1"",
                typeVal = ""New""
            },
            new myClasses.Type 
            {
                typeId=""2"",
                typeVal = ""Old""
            }
       };
    }
    public myClasses.Employee[] GetAllEmployees()
    {
        return new myClasses.Employee[]
        {
            new myClasses.Employee 
            {
                empId=""111111"",
                empFName = ""Jane"",
                empLName=""Doe""
            },
            new myClasses.Employee 
            {
                empId=""222222"",
                empFName = ""John"",
                empLName=""Doe""
            }
       };
    }
    public bool VerifyEmployeeId(string id)
    {
        myClasses.Employee[] emp = new myClasses.Employee[]
        {
            new myClasses.Employee 
            {
                empId=""111111"",
                empFName = ""Jane"",
                empLName=""Doe""
            },
            new myClasses.Employee 
            {
                empId=""222222"",
                empFName = ""John"",
                empLName=""Doe""
            }
       };
        for (var i = 0; i <= emp.Length - 1; i++)
        {
            if (emp[i].empId == id)
                return true;
        }
        return false;
      }
    }
